wappsto.configureNumberValue|block: setup Wappsto Number Value %valueID Name: %name Type: %type||Min: %min Max: %max Step: %step Unit: %unit
wappsto.configureStringValue|block: setup Wappsto String Value %valueID with name %name as type %type
wappsto.configureValue|block: setup Wappsto Number Value %valueID with name %name as %type
wappsto.configureName|block: setup Micro:bit on Wappsto with name %name
wappsto.onNumberEvent|block: on Number Value %valueID received from Wappsto
wappsto.onStringEvent|block: on String Value %valueID received from Wappsto
wappsto.sendNumberToWappsto|block: send number %input to Wappsto Number Value %valueID||%behaviour
wappsto.sendStringToWappsto|block: send string %input to Wappsto String Value %valueID||%behaviour
